name: Haidyn Harvey
introduction: Haidyn Janae' Harvey was born in Pueblo, Colorado on April 5th 1997. The youngest of three, Haidyn is the aunt of 6 nieces and nephews. She began performing at the age of 3 in a local song and dance troupe. Wanting to continue to perform she began taking acting classes at 9 years old and after 2 months she had the opportunity to audition for a short indie in Los Angeles called "The Blackness". She landed the lead role as the "Little Girl". Within the next year Haidyn began to film often. She then received the role of "Dancing Katie" in "I Sell the Dead" with Ron Pearlman and Dominic Monaghan. She traveled to NYC for the first time to film. Since then she has continued to act in such projects as Nickelodeon's Big Green Help "Grow it Green" and the pilot "Traffic Light" along with several feature films to her credit. She has filmed in NYC, Indiana, California and Denver.
